title: SB Xero OCR Global Reader
description: Reads Xero invoice/attachment manifests and runs OCR + horse tracking.

Year.title: Year
Year.description: Financial year this run applies to (e.g. 2016, 2020).

LedgerUrl.title: Ledger CSV URL
LedgerUrl.description: HTTPS URL to the ledger/master financials CSV for this year.

InvoiceUrl.title: Invoice Manifest CSV URL
InvoiceUrl.description: HTTPS URL to the invoice manifest CSV for this year.

ManifestUrl.title: Attachment Manifest CSV URL
ManifestUrl.description: HTTPS URL to the attachment manifest CSV for this year.

likelyTrackingHorse.title: Include likely tracking horse detection
likelyTrackingHorse.description: If true, enable heuristics to flag likely tracking horses even when not explicitly labelled.
